titles.title: Beloved Let Us Love One Another

properties.copyright: 1973 Scripture In Song, Administered by Integrity Music, Inc.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Beloved let us love one another
For love is of God
And everyone who loveth
Is born of God and knoweth God

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
He who loveth not
Knoweth not God
For God is love
Beloved let us love one another
First John Four Seven and Eight
